repos.excerpt: CLI tool for Windows that allows users to back up folders as zip files. It also provides terminal commands to easily assign folders for backup.
Google Chrome extension automating 'Skip Intro' and 'Next Episode' buttons on Netflix, for seamless binge-watching.
Website built with React and Typescript showcasing my projects, with a Python tool for easy data updates and new project page generation.
A Discord bot designed for movie night that not only tracks movies but also integrates AI to offer remarks about movies or participate in conversations, all while impersonating Adam Sandler.
Videogame project in C# using MonoGame, featuring robots collecting ores in a procedurally generated world.
A Dungeons & Dragons Discord bot with dice rolling, data lookup, character stat generation, voice chat effects, and token-image creation. Powered by 5e.tools for up-to-date content.
Bot that searches LinkedIn for relevant job postings, filters out irrelevant ones, and sends job details via Telegram.
